short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Mass Demographics (shows all students in a class at once) to your Gradebook screen. For the Bernards Township district.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to quickly copy and paste entire classes of emails for email blast purposes. For Bernards Township District.
